explanation: Normal adult respiratory rate is 12–20 breaths per minute.

explanation: A non-rebreather mask can deliver up to ~90-100% oxygen.

explanation: VFib and pulseless VTach are shockable rhythms.

explanation: Airway management is always the first priority in trauma (ABCs).
